# Stripe

### Description

Integrates with Stripe's API to enable payment processing, customer management, and financial operations for e-commerce and billing workflows.

### Authorization


To use this MCP server, you need to need API credentials in your environment. Please refer to the [server homepage ↗](None) for more information.


### Usage

To use this MCP server, you need a [Portia API key](/setup-account). After you log in, you can enable the server in your Portia tool registry. To find out how, please refer to the [cloud tool registry documentation ↗](/cloud-tool-registry).

Once enabled, you can view the list of tools via the dashboard, or using the `portia-cli`:

```bash
$ PORTIA_API_KEY=<your-api-key> portia-cli list-tools
```
